comments.creator: ted@mielczarek.org
comments.text:
Doing cross-compile Spidermonkey builds, I often forget to set AR and RANLIB. configure doesn't error on these, but linking fails later in the build.

We should just error out in configure on platforms where we're going to need these.
comments.author: ted@mielczarek.org
comments.raw_text:
Doing cross-compile Spidermonkey builds, I often forget to set AR and RANLIB. configure doesn't error on these, but linking fails later in the build.

We should just error out in configure on platforms where we're going to need these.
